manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Collagenetics Spa is the renewing, repairing, and revitalizing treatment your skin deserves. Restorative Moisturizer from the Devoted Creations Collagenetics Spa Collection will work to maintain and promote the overall health of your skin. The innovative formula pairs perfectly as a replenishing hydrating crème after the use of any type of infrared or light therapy. Paraben & Sulfate Free

Vitamin E Reduces the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. Himalayan Salt Helps to extract the toxins out of your skin leaving you feeling refreshed and nourished. Pepha-Age Restores even skin tone after light exposure.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Was super skeptical in the beginning!
reviews.reviewText: I just ordered my second bottle. Would have purchased 2 or more had it not been the last one until they restocked!!! I first seen this lotion at my local tanning salon and was in love with the fragrance. I read on the bottle about all of the cool things it claims to do for your skin if used daily. It claimed to tighten, restore and help with aged skin, or to slow down the process. Also claims that it CAN help with body fat etc. Just the nice smell had me sold, because quite frankly, I do not believe in all of the gimmick's out there, nor do I completely even trust the beauty industry itself, because it is mostly gimmicks! My local salon wanted $45 a bottle. So, my first instinct, of course, Amazon! lol. Yup, my go-to for all of my overpriced necessities and wants! I get on here, and boom, it is a whopping $20. Yes, the price did raise by two bucks since my last purchase, but compared to $45, I would be crazy. I have applied this lotion from face to toe almost every single day after my evening daily shower for right at two months now. Wow! This lotion is some kind of awesomeness!!! I am telling you the honest consumer truth! My skin has completely changed, in a good way! We tan at the salon about three to four months of the year (the warmer months) and give our skin and wallet a break during fall and winter. So naturally my skin gets exposure to the Uva, thus causing some damage. You may not be able to visibly see the damage, but you can feel the difference on your skins surface after a few tanning sessions. Almost a leathery type feels to it, super dry and just not soft. After a week of using this my softness was back! After close to a month, my skin has never felt or looked so healthy! I have a "glow" about me. The appearance of any stretch marks that i have on my hips are Barely noticeable after a month of daily use, and when I sit down my thighs would create the cellulite look, that is now almost unnoticeable! My tan has never been so natural looking. I've also noticed since using, that it has extended my tan, thus I do not have to lay as often as I did in all of the years prior. Usually, I would have to lay at least 2 or 3 times per week to keep my tan, but now I lay once a week or 2 times to 3 in a three-week period because my tan doesn't fade as fast. This lotion claims to do many, many good things for your skin. So far, I cannot refute this claim! I more than recommend this lotion to any and everyone! The scent may be a little much for some, but I find it quite pleasant. Clean and fresh! I do recommend using this religiously on a daily basis, at least once a day to get the max benefits! I promise, once you use it for a day or two, you will find yourself looking forward to slathering it all over!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Smells fantastic and makes my skin so soft. Feels lightweight and not greasy

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars love how it absorbs
reviews.reviewText: I love how quickly the lotion absorbs and a pleasant smell. The pump can be tricky to open and I had to watch you tube to see if there was a trick and there was! If yours does not pop open all you have to do is unscrew the pump top hold pump and turn the cap part until it releases.I have been doing Red Light Therapy now for almost a month now (I have Lyme disease) and I use this AFTER my session. I also get a massage once a month and my massage therapist commented on my skin and how great it looked and felt. I don't know if it is from the Red Light or the lotion but either one the combination works!I would highly recommend this lotion on its own or with the RLT it goes on smooth doesn't leave a greasy feeling.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Kindof sticky after feel
reviews.reviewText: After reading the reviews I really expected something wonderful, and I’m not so sure that this is. I use it after red light and tanning, and use their other product pre-red light. It smells nice and feels great going on, but by the time I get home I want to shower because it leaves a sortof sticky, dusty, heavy feel. My skin does feel hydrated, though that may be just because I’m using lotion regularly. Aside from that, I don’t see any benefit to using it. All this said, I’ve only had it for about a month, so if in another month or two that changes, I will update my review. The bottle is quite large and will last a good while I believe, I just don’t love the after feel, and probably lose any benefit by having to wash it off!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pump broken 1st time
reviews.reviewText: Absolutely love this lotion, it's light it smells great. On the first bottle the pump had popped off and broke and would not go back on. Reported it immediately they sent me a new bottle the very next day. When you twist it to open it doesn't do anything. You have to take off the top wipe off the spout or even put a rag around the bottom part of it hold it tightly and then turn the pump and the correct direction. My suggestion if in doubt look up YouTube videos how to open the pump. Now I have no issues it's great hope this helps

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good lotion but not worth the price!
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been trying to give this lotion a fair shot so I use it approximately 5 days a week. However, I don’t see the results of what it claims to do! Examples would be Promoting Fat LossTightens & TonesReduces celluliteIt works great as a moisturizing lotion though but you can get those pretty much anywhere for a better price & that smell way better as well. The smell is ok. Nothing that lingers in the nostrils of those you walk by though! I like to leave some fragrance behind when I walk by people lol!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing! Price is incredible! Yay
reviews.reviewText: This is such a good moisturizer! I originally bought this at my tanning bed place and fell in love with it, then found it on here! This is the exact same product but the price is WAY BETTER!! But this stuff smells amazing and makes my skin so so soft! It’s a medium-feel moisturizer, not thick like Nivea, but not too light like Jergens. It adds a bit of a sheen to your skin, which I love, bc #1, makes me look more tan and #2, makes my skin “glisten”. But I promise, it’s not like a shiney look, it’s a very nice moisturizer!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smells so good

reviews.reviewText: Je ne m’attendais pas à avoir la vraie qualité. Mais franchement, je suis agréablement surprise ! Elle sent super bonne aussi
• improves cellulite• moistens & tightens skin• need to apply 2-3 times/day (save it for special occasions)• feminine smell

I like the smell and the feeling of this lotion. It’s light but it really has made my skin feel like butter on the days I don’t use it! I would say it’s just a bit expensive for a body lotion compared to a lot that’s out there! With that being said though, it is really good.

reviews.reviewTitle: THis is an amazing product, you will love the way it works
reviews.reviewText: This product is amazing on my skin.
